response.original_title: Within the eye of the storm / Be’ein Ha’se’ara
response.overview: A thought provoking and inspiring documentary of shared tragedy and the unexpected journey of an Israeli and a Palestinian. Bassam and Rami, each once a dedicated fighter for his cause, have been faced with similar tragic losses. Their grief results in a surprising friendship as they become peace activists, working together—former enemies, now brothers in a cause. Their ultimate message, delivered on the Israeli radio show they co-hosted, is “It won’t end if we don’t talk”.
